title: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: I am not able to understand the issue at hand with bug 8142. When I try to access the scoped type hierarchy of a binary project (e.g., org.apache.ant), I receive the following error message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. Could someone please explain what this message means?
OB: When attempting to access the scoped type hierarchy for org.apache.ant, I receive the error message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'
EB: I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars when accessing the scoped type hierarchy for org.apache.ant
SR: To reproduce the issue, try accessing the scoped type hierarchy for org.apache.ant and observe the error message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'
